product.name: Deye 20kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-20K-SG01HP3-EU-BM4)
product.description:
Model 



Deye 20kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-20K-SG01HP3-EU-AM2)



Deye 20kw Battery Input Data




Battery Type: Lead-acid or Lithium-ion



Battery Voltage Range(V):150~700V



Max. Charging Current (A): 37



Max. Discharging Current (A): 37



Number of battery input: 1



Charging Curve: 3 Stages / Equalization



Charging Strategy for Li-Ion Battery: Self-adaption to BMS




Deye 20kw PV String Input Data




Max. DC Input Power (W): 26000W



Max. DC Input Voltage (V): 1000



Start-up Voltage (V): 180



MPPT Range (V): 150V-850V



Full Load DC Voltage Range (V): 500-850



PV Input Current (A): 26A+26A



Max. PV ISC (A): 39A+39A



Number of MPPT / Strings per MPPT: 2/2




Deye 20kw AC Output Data




Rated AC Output and UPS Power (W): 20000W



Max. AC Output Power (W): 22000W



Peak Power (off grid): 1.5 times of rated power, 10 S



AC Output Rated Current (A): 30.3



Max. AC Current (A): 35



Max. Continuous AC Passthrough (A): 80A



Output Frequency and Voltage: 50/60Hz;3L/N/PE 220/380Vac，230/400Vac



Grid Type: Three Phase



DC injection current (mA): <0.5%1n




Deye 20kw Efficiency




Max. Efficiency: 97.60%



Euro Efficiency: 97.00%



MPPT Efficiency: 99.90%




Deye 20kw Protection




PV Input Lightning Protection: Integrated



Anti-islanding Protection: Integrated



PV String Input Reverse Polarity Protection: Integrated



Insulation Resistor Detection: Integrated



Residual Current Monitoring Unit: Integrated



Output Over Current Protection: Integrated



Output Shorted Protection: Integrated



Surge protection: Integrated



Output Over Voltage Protection: DC Type II / AC Type II




Certifications and Standards




Grid Regulation:  CEI 0-21, VDE-AR-N 4105, NRS 097, IEC 62116, IEC 61727, G99, G98, VDE 0126-1-1, RD 1699, C10-11



Safety EMC / Standard: IEC/EN 61000-6-1/2/3/4, IEC/EN 62109-1, IEC/EN 62109-2




General Data




Operating Temperature Range (℃): -40~60℃, >45℃ Derating



Cooling: Smart cooling



Noise (dB): <45 dB



Communication with BMS: RS485; CAN



Weight (kg): 26



Size (mm): 434W×645H×245D



Protection Degree: IP65



Installation Style: Wall-mounted



Warranty: 5 years

product.name: Deye 50kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-50K-SG01HP3-EU-BM4)
product.description:
Description



Deye 50kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase is a brand new series of 3 phase hybrid inverter supporting 160-700V HV Battery, ensuring system efficiency and less heat dissipation. With compact design and high-power density, this series supports 1.3 DC/AC ratio, saving device investment. It supports three phase unbalanced output, extending the application scenarios. 



Smart Monitoring Platform




Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye 50kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.




Product Highlights




100% unbalanced output



each phase AC couple to retrofit existing solar system



*Max. 10 pcs parallel for on-grid and off-grid operation



Support multiple batteries parallel



Max. charging/discharging current of 100A



High voltage battery, higher efficiency



6 time periods for battery charging/discharging



Support storing energy from diesel generator
product.short_description: Deye 50kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase is a brand new series of three phase hybrid inverter supporting 160-700V HV Battery, ensuring system efficiency.

images.alt: Deye 50kw Hybrid inverter 3 phase with smart monitoring

product.name: Deye 12kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-12K-SG04LP3)
product.description: Deye 12kw Hybrid inverter SUN 5/6/8/10/12K-SG is brand new three phase hybrid inverter with low battery voltage 48V, ensuring system safe and reliable. With compact design and high-power density, this series supports 1.3 DC/AC ratio, saving device investment. It supports three phase unbalanced output, extending the application scenarios. Equipped with CAN port (x2) BMS and parallel, x1 RS485 port for BMS, x1 RS232 port for remotely control, x1 DRM port, which makes the system smart and flexible. Smart Monitoring Platform Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.
product.short_description: Deye 12kw Hybrid inverter is a brand new series of three phase hybrid inverter supporting 160-700V HV Battery, ensuring system efficiency.

product.name: Deye 5kw Hybrid Inverter (SUN-5K-SG01LP1-EU)
product.description:
Deye 5kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.  



During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery via SUN 3/6K-SG04. 



Finally, the stored energy can be released when the loads require it. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure uninterrupted supply in the event of grid blackout.



It equipped with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.



The New SUN-3K-SG04LP1 hybrid inverter adopts 24V battery, greatly improving your system safety.



Description



Smart Monitoring Platform



Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs.Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.



Includes:  Wi-Fi Dongle + BMS Communication Cable
product.short_description: Deye 5kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.
